snippet: Pakistan’s political and military leadership agreed to clear the way for peace talks with the Pakistani Taliban, calling it the best strategy to end militant-driven bloodshed.

byline.original: By SALMAN MASOOD and DECLAN WALSH

lead_paragraph: Pakistan’s political and military leadership agreed to clear the way for peace talks with the Pakistani Taliban, calling it the best strategy to end militant-driven bloodshed.

headline.main: Pakistan Takes Step Toward Talks With the Taliban
